original_title: Easter Attacks: US stands in solidarity with those awaiting justice
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); US Ambassador to Sri Lanka Julie Chung joined Sri Lankans to remember those who were killed in the 2019 April 21st Terror Attacks.
'Today I remember the hundreds of innocent people, including five Americans, who were murdered four years ago in a horrific act of terror on Easter Sunday," she tweeted.
The U.S. honors the victims, their families & all affected communities and stands in solidarity with those awaiting justice, she added.
